description: Open-House Saturday & Sunday 24th & 25th January 1-3pm Well-maintained and spacious townhouse in the desirable Panorama West Coast Living community. This home offers 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms with a functional open layout. The open-concept kitchen features shaker-style soft-close cabinets, stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, and a beverage fridge in the island. Bright living space with two balconies provides excellent natural light. Enjoy a private fenced yard, ideal for kids and BBQs. Close to the clubhouse, schools, transit, shopping, and restaurants.
